com.hcl.domino.keep.dbfunctions

Class ItemJsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.domino.keep.dbfunctions.ItemJsonHelper

  • public class ItemJsonHelper
extends java.lang.Object

    Helper class to convert Items from a Domino document into their value suitable for inclusion in JSON

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray fromList(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)
      Converts TYPE_TEXT_LIST and TYPE_NUMBER_RANGE to a JsonArray
      static java.lang.String fromRichText(com.hcl.domino.DominoClient client, com.hcl.domino.data.Document doc, java.lang.String itemName)
      Converts a RichText Item into HTML or errors with null when item doesn’t exist or is not RichText
      static java.lang.Object fromTextOrJson(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)
      Converts a TYPE_TEXT item into text or when it looks like JSON into a JSON Object or array

      Converts item into a ISO date-time string
      static io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray fromTimeRange(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)
      Converts a time range into a Json Array A time range can contain discrete values or ranges again
      static java.lang.Object fromUnknown(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)
      Converts unknown Domino data on a best effort basis

        public static io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray fromList(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)

        Converts TYPE_TEXT_LIST and TYPE_NUMBER_RANGE to a JsonArray

        Parameters:
        item - Domino Item to convert
        Returns:
        JsonArray with values

      • fromRichText

        public static java.lang.String fromRichText(com.hcl.domino.DominoClient client,
                                            com.hcl.domino.data.Document doc,
                                            java.lang.String itemName)

        Converts a RichText Item into HTML or errors with null when item doesn’t exist or is not RichText

        Parameters:
        client - Domino client to run the conversion
        doc - Domino document containing the item
        itemName - itemName (conversion doesn’t need item itself)
        Returns:
        String - converted HTML

      • fromTextOrJson

        public static java.lang.Object fromTextOrJson(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)

        Converts a TYPE_TEXT item into text or when it looks like JSON into a JSON Object or array

        Parameters:
        item - Domino Item
        Returns:
        text if it is a String or JSON if it looks and smells like JSON

      • fromTime

        public static java.lang.String fromTime(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)

        Converts item into a ISO date-time string

        Parameters:
        item - Domino item containing date
        Returns:
        ISO Date string

      • fromTimeRange

        public static io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray fromTimeRange(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)

        Converts a time range into a Json Array A time range can contain discrete values or ranges again

        Parameters:
        item - TimeRange item
        Returns:
        JsonArray with ISA values

      • fromUnknown

        public static java.lang.Object fromUnknown(com.hcl.domino.data.Item item)

        Converts unknown Domino data on a best effort basis

        Parameters:
        item - Domino Item
        Returns:
        scalar value or a JsonArray

      • itemDataTypeMapper

        public static java.lang.Object itemDataTypeMapper(java.lang.Object incoming)

        Boils down the item data type to those that are supported by JsonObject

        Parameters:
        incoming - original object
        Returns:
        same object if supported, String if not
